data.lyric:
[ti:We're Good]
[ar:Dua Lipa]
[al:Future Nostalgia (The Moonlight Edition) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]We're Good - Dua Lipa
[00:03.35]Composed by：Dua Lipa/Emily Warren/Scott Harris/Sylvester Willy Sivertsen
[00:06.71]I'm on an island even when you're close
[00:13.96]Can't take the silence I'd rather be alone
[00:21.60]I think it's pretty plain and simple we gave it all we could
[00:28.74]It's time I wave goodbye from the window
[00:32.42]Let's end this like we should and say we're good
[00:37.15]We're not meant to be like sleeping and c*****e
[00:43.95]So let's at least agree to go our separate ways
[00:50.33]How can I judge you when you're with somebody else
[00:53.94]As long as you swear you won't be pissed when I do it myself
[00:57.26]Let's end it like we should and say we're good
[01:04.06]No need to hide it go get what you want
[01:11.14]This won't be a burden if we both don't hold a grudge
[01:18.81]I think it's pretty plain and simple we gave it all we could
[01:26.05]It's time I wave goodbye from the window
[01:29.55]Let's end this like we should and say we're good
[01:34.35]We're not meant to be like sleeping and c*****e
[01:41.26]So let's at least agree to go our separate ways
[01:47.67]How can I judge you when you're with somebody else
[01:51.31]As long as you swear you won't be pissed when I do it myself
[01:54.49]Let's end it like we should and say we're good
[01:58.56]Now you're holding this against me like I knew you would
[02:05.44]I'm trying my best to make this easy
[02:09.02]So don't give me that look just say we're good
[02:13.75]We're not meant to be like sleeping and c*****e
[02:20.73]So let's at least agree to go our separate ways oh
[02:27.24]How can I judge you when you're with somebody else
[02:30.74]As long as you swear you won't be pissed when I do it myself
[02:34.05]Let's end it like we should and say we're good
data.trans:
[ti:We're Good]
[ar:Dua Lipa]
[al:Future Nostalgia (The Moonlight Edition) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.35]//
[00:06.71]即便你就在身侧 我也仿佛置身孤岛
[00:13.96]无法忍受沉默 我宁愿一个人待着
[00:21.60]我想这应该浅显易懂 我们尽力付出了所有
[00:28.74]我是时候该打开窗户 挥手告别了
[00:32.42]就这样结束吧 这是理所应当的 承认吧 我们都能接受
[00:37.15]我们并非命中注定 像是睡觉抽烟一样的理所当然
[00:43.95]所以至少让我们好聚好散
[00:50.33]你跟别人在一起 我又如何能够评判你
[00:53.94]只要你发誓 由我自己来结束 你不会勃然大怒
[00:57.26]就这样结束吧 这是理所应当的 承认吧 我们都能接受
[01:04.06]没有必要遮遮掩掩 想做什么就去做
[01:11.14]如果我们都没有怀恨在心 那也不会有所负担
[01:18.81]我想这应该浅显易懂 我们尽力付出了所有
[01:26.05]我是时候该打开窗户 挥手告别了
[01:29.55]就这样结束吧 这是理所应当的 承认吧 我们都能接受
[01:34.35]我们并非命中注定 像是睡觉抽烟一样的理所当然
[01:41.26]所以至少让我们好聚好散
[01:47.67]你跟别人在一起 我又如何能够评判你
[01:51.31]只要你发誓 由我自己来结束 你不会勃然大怒
[01:54.49]就这样结束吧 这是理所应当的 承认吧 我们都能接受
[01:58.56]现在你极力反对我 我早料到你会这么做
[02:05.44]我尽力让一切简单了结
[02:09.02]所以不要那样看着我 只需要承认 我们都能接受
[02:13.75]我们并非命中注定 像是睡觉抽烟一样的理所当然
[02:20.73]所以至少让我们好聚好散
[02:27.24]你跟别人在一起 我又如何能够评判你
[02:30.74]只要你发誓 由我自己来结束 你不会勃然大怒
[02:34.05]就这样结束吧 这是理所应当的 承认吧 我们都能接受
